• Bottles shipped 2 times a year
• 4, 6 & 12 Bottle memberships available
• Add variety to your cellar at an accessible price
• Exclusive events & more! ## Governors 4
  * 4 bottles mixed per shipment. * Two reds & two whites, selected by the W.H. team. * 15% savings on cases, 10% on Bottles. * 50% off bottles enjoyed on-site. * 1 flight or glass per person, per visit. (Up to 2 people.)
  * Exclusive Discounts & Pick-up Parties 


## Governors 6
  * Wines curated by the W.H. team.
